text: my name is Steve Urban I'm the founder
and CEO of a company called integrate AI
so we do is we have larger traditional
companies compete with digital
disruptors traditionally focused on
retail banking and telecommunications
and retail and what we try to do is to
try to get in say their journey to look
more like Netflix and not end up like
Blockbuster it's different than a
Netflix would be they don't get to start
from scratch they have a lot of legacy
technology and the question is how do
you utilize the existing tech stack but
add a layer of intelligence so that you
can start to understand more what your
customers want and then be able to
quickly in real time make better
decisions that lead to more profitable
outcomes so one of those that we really
focus on is this idea of customer
centricity which is how do you have a
better understanding in real time as to
why you're showing up and we're going
and trying to find like can we make a

why they're there and can you use that
prediction to try to then create an

they want faster resulting in more
loyalty spending more money with you but
feeling better about the experience
which has been a huge challenge for a
lot of these traditional companies
well the fundamental thesis of the
business is that getting to know your
customers better actually giving them
what they want is good business and
we've gotten away from that like the
relationship between a lot of businesses
and consumers is really broken and I
think what people are seeing now with
like the Amazons and Netflix the googles
of this world is oh it doesn't need to
work this way I can kind of show up and
the experience would be curated for me
and I can get to what I want faster and
that expectation is now the baseline for
all these traditional businesses but you
know 99 percent of companies are not
anywhere close to being and so the

path to competing in this new digital
age big focus for us I think is helping
Shepherd a lot of these big companies
through this transition area period and
at the same time one of the core
features that we've gone and our
platform is what we call the trusted
signals exchange which is a way to be
able to pass intelligence on
interactions with consumers between
businesses without ever using personally
identifiable information or doing
anything that would compromise the
individual's privacy if you can learn
from interaction patterns and that leads
to a better experience for me like
that's the panacea for both consumers
and businesses so I think as we move
forward what you're gonna see is our
trusted signals exchange is going to be
hopefully the default standard for a lot
of businesses to be able to get in the
game and that on the back end of that
you're gonna see billions of consumers
that are gonna live better lives and
feel better about the decisions that are
being made on them hopefully less
disadvantaged because the decisions are
being taken by a system that cares
